titleStmt.title: A congratulatory poem humbly offered to the King, upon His return home, after the taking of Namur. By Mr. Manning.
titleStmt.author: Manning, Mr. (Francis), fl. 1688-1716.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Peter Buck, at the sign of the Temple, near Temple-Bar in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
